Quinn Miyamoto is a junior engineering major at Harvey Mudd College.
More specifically, she is interested in digital electronics and mechanical design.
So far, she has completed courses pertaining to computer architecture, electricity and magnetism, and system-on-chip design.
She has a Level Two CAD certification in Rhino, and works as a Makerspace steward for Harvey Mudd College, with a certification to teach users welding.
When she is not working, you can find her reading manga/manhwa, binging bad Netflix shows, gaming, or rock-climbing.
